channel.title: How do you make it so people cant make accounts?
channel.description: How do you make it so no 1 can make an account for example i want my server to only have 10 accounts that i give to my friends and no 1 else can make other accounts on the server how could i do this also can my friends connect to my server directly threw my regular ip?
